## isDate() function

Returns whether or not the given value is of type `Date`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isDate(o: any): o is Date;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  o | any |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

o is Date
